text: The material in IRM 1.2.24 has been moved to IRM 1.2.1.16, Servicewide Policies and Authorities, Policy Statements for Special Topics. All Policy Statements contained in IRM 1.2.10 through IRM 1.2.25 were consolidated and moved to IRM 1.2.1, Servicewide Policy Statements.
IRM 1.2.24, Policy Statements for Special Topics dated June 12, 2015 is obsolete as of August 1, 2019.
Director, Servicewide Policy, Directives and Electronic Resources Research, Applied Analytics and Statistics
